front.title: Draft Guide for Testing Metal-Enclosed Switchgear Rated up to 38kV for Internal Arcing Faults

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.keyword: metal-enclosed low-voltage power circuit breaker switchgear
front.abstract: This corrigendum corrects technical errors found in the test guide during use in laboratories concerning current values and arc initiation in LV testing and supply frequency for all equipment.
